items.sentence: Tom is in his room with some of his friends.
Tom is the quarterback of the football team.
Tom had never really paid attention to Mary.
That dinner they had together was delicious.
One of Tom's ancestors lived in that castle.
Cows give us milk and chickens give us eggs.
When did you and Tom start working together?
I finally found the answer to that question.
Soon you will be saying something different.
You could've knocked me down with a feather.
The person I saw at the bus stop wasn't Tom.
Today, we had an evacuation drill at school.
The first time I saw it was three years ago.
Were you afraid that something might happen?
Tom bought every painting that Mary painted.
I'll buy the one that Tom says I should buy.
My mother was busy getting ready for dinner.
Do you remember the first time I kissed you?
How would you go about solving this problem?
We spent a lot of money remodeling our home.
